comprehensive_overview: pbptyper is a tool for high-throughput genotyping of bacterial pathogens based on MinION nanopore sequencing data. It utilizes a portable and scalable approach to rapidly and accurately type multiple bacterial isolates simultaneously.
core_features:
1. Rapid and accurate genotyping of bacterial pathogens
2. High-throughput analysis of MinION nanopore sequencing data
3. Portable and scalable approach
4. Simultaneous typing of multiple bacterial isolates
